body_html:
Some good news! In addition to the audio ops changes Pete mentions above, TensorFlow 1.4 will have:

  • tf.spectral.dct - for computing the DCT-II, with GPU and gradient support (other DCT types coming soon).
  • tf.contrib.signal.mfccs_from_log_mel_spectrograms - for computing MFCCs from log mel spectrograms with GPU and gradient support.
  • tf.contrib.signal.linear_to_mel_weight_matrix - for reweighting a linear-scale spectrogram into the mel-scale.
body_text:
Some good news! In addition to the audio ops changes Pete mentions above, TensorFlow 1.4 will have:

tf.spectral.dct - for computing the DCT-II, with GPU and gradient support (other DCT types coming soon).
tf.contrib.signal.mfccs_from_log_mel_spectrograms - for computing MFCCs from log mel spectrograms with GPU and gradient support.
tf.contrib.signal.linear_to_mel_weight_matrix - for reweighting a linear-scale spectrogram into the mel-scale.
body:
Some good news! In addition to the audio ops changes Pete mentions above, TensorFlow 1.4 will have:

* `tf.spectral.dct` - for computing the DCT-II, with GPU and gradient support (other DCT types coming soon).
* `tf.contrib.signal.mfccs_from_log_mel_spectrograms` - for computing MFCCs from log mel spectrograms with GPU and gradient support.
* `tf.contrib.signal.linear_to_mel_weight_matrix` - for reweighting a linear-scale spectrogram into the mel-scale.
